description: Try our easy to follow Poached Pears in Red Wine Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Poached Pears in Red Wine Sauce
name: Poached Pears in Red Wine Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lower pears into poaching liquid and simmer for 20-30 minutes, or until tender. Turn pears occasionally during cooking so they colour evenly.
